        FROM [Functions] AS [f]

""SELECT [t].[HomeOrder], [t].[Id], [c.Products].[CategoryId], [c.Products].[Content], [c.Products].[DateCreated], [c.Products].[DateModified], [c.Products].[Description], [c.Products].[HomeFlag], [c.Products].[HotFlag], [c.Products].[Id] AS [Id0], [c.Products].[Image], [c.Products].[Name], [c.Products].[OriginalPrice], [c.Products].[Price], [c.Products].[PromotionPrice], [c.Products].[SeoAlias], [c.Products].[SeoDescription], [c.Products].[SeoKeywords], [c.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [c.Products].[Status], [c.Products].[Tags], [c.Products].[Unit], [c.Products].[ViewCount]
FROM [Products] AS [c.Products]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
    FROM [ProductCategories] AS [c0]
    WHERE [c0].[HomeFlag] = 1
    ORDER BY [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [c.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [t].[HomeOrder], [t].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]

ORDER BY [x].[DateCreated] DESC, [x].[Id], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

) AS [t] ON [x.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id0]

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]
    WHERE [z].[Status] = 1

FROM [Products] AS [c.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
    FROM [ProductCategories] AS [c0]
    WHERE [c0].[HomeFlag] = 1
    ORDER BY [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [c.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id]

INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x0].[DateCreated], [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [Products] AS [x0]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory0] ON [x0].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    WHERE ([x0].[Status] = 1) AND ([x0].[HotFlag] = 1)
    ORDER BY [x0].[DateCreated] DESC, [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [x.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id0]

""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]
    WHERE [z].[Status] = 1
) AS [t] ON [y].[BillId] = [t].[Id]

""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]
    WHERE [z].[Status] = 1
) AS [t] ON [y].[BillId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [y].[Quantity] DESC, [x].[Id], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT [t1].[Quantity], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Content], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[DateCreated], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[DateModified], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Description], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[HomeFlag], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[HotFlag], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Id] AS [Id1], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Image], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Name], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[OriginalPrice], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Price], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[PromotionPrice], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Status], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Tags], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Unit], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[ViewCount]
FROM [Products] AS [x.ProductCategory.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [y0].[Quantity], [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [Products] AS [x0]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory0] ON [x0].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y0] ON [x0].[Id] = [y0].[ProductId]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [z0].*
        FROM [Bills] AS [z0]
        WHERE [z0].[Status] = 1
    ) AS [t0] ON [y0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]
    ORDER BY [y0].[Quantity] DESC, [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
) AS [t1] ON [x.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId] = [t1].[Id0]

""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]
    WHERE [z].[Status] = 1
) AS [t] ON [y].[BillId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [y].[Quantity] DESC, [x].[Id], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

""SELECT [t].[HomeOrder], [t].[Id], [c.Products].[CategoryId], [c.Products].[Content], [c.Products].[DateCreated], [c.Products].[DateModified], [c.Products].[Description], [c.Products].[HomeFlag], [c.Products].[HotFlag], [c.Products].[Id] AS [Id0], [c.Products].[Image], [c.Products].[Name], [c.Products].[OriginalPrice], [c.Products].[Price], [c.Products].[PromotionPrice], [c.Products].[SeoAlias], [c.Products].[SeoDescription], [c.Products].[SeoKeywords], [c.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [c.Products].[Status], [c.Products].[Tags], [c.Products].[Unit], [c.Products].[ViewCount]
FROM [Products] AS [c.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
    FROM [ProductCategories] AS [c0]
    WHERE [c0].[HomeFlag] = 1
    ORDER BY [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [c.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id]

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x0].[DateCreated], [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id0]

""SELECT [t].[HomeOrder], [t].[Id], [c.Products].[CategoryId], [c.Products].[Content], [c.Products].[DateCreated], [c.Products].[DateModified], [c.Products].[Description], [c.Products].[HomeFlag], [c.Products].[HotFlag], [c.Products].[Id] AS [Id0], [c.Products].[Image], [c.Products].[Name], [c.Products].[OriginalPrice], [c.Products].[Price], [c.Products].[PromotionPrice], [c.Products].[SeoAlias], [c.Products].[SeoDescription], [c.Products].[SeoKeywords], [c.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [c.Products].[Status], [c.Products].[Tags], [c.Products].[Unit], [c.Products].[ViewCount]
FROM [Products] AS [c.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
    FROM [ProductCategories] AS [c0]
    WHERE [c0].[HomeFlag] = 1
    ORDER BY [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [c.Products].[CategoryId] = [t].[Id]

    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE ([x].[Status] = 1) AND ([x].[HotFlag] = 1)
ORDER BY [x].[DateCreated] DESC, [x].[Id], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x0].[DateCreated], [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [Products] AS [x0]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory0] ON [x0].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    WHERE ([x0].[Status] = 1) AND ([x0].[HotFlag] = 1)
    ORDER BY [x0].[DateCreated] DESC, [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]

""SELECT [t].[HomeOrder], [t].[Id], [c.Products].[CategoryId], [c.Products].[Content], [c.Products].[DateCreated], [c.Products].[DateModified], [c.Products].[Description], [c.Products].[HomeFlag], [c.Products].[HotFlag], [c.Products].[Id] AS [Id0], [c.Products].[Image], [c.Products].[Name], [c.Products].[OriginalPrice], [c.Products].[Price], [c.Products].[PromotionPrice], [c.Products].[SeoAlias], [c.Products].[SeoDescription], [c.Products].[SeoKeywords], [c.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [c.Products].[Status], [c.Products].[Tags], [c.Products].[Unit], [c.Products].[ViewCount]
FROM [Products] AS [c.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]
    FROM [ProductCategories] AS [c0]
    WHERE [c0].[HomeFlag] = 1
    ORDER BY [c0].[HomeOrder], [c0].[Id]

""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]
    WHERE [z].[Status] = 1
) AS [t] ON [y].[BillId] = [t].[Id]
ORDER BY [y].[Quantity] DESC, [x].[Id], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)
2019-07-26T18:22:43.3499572+07:00 0HLOHND8P9VFH:00000005 [INF] Executed DbCommand ("43"ms) [Parameters=["@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)"], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']"
""SELECT [t1].[Quantity], [t1].[Id], [t1].[Id0], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[CategoryId], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Content], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[DateCreated], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[DateModified], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Description], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[HomeFlag], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[HotFlag], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Id] AS [Id1], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Image], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Name], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[OriginalPrice], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Price], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[PromotionPrice], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Status], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Tags], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[Unit], [x.ProductCategory.Products].[ViewCount]
FROM [Products] AS [x.ProductCategory.Products]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [y0].[Quantity], [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [Products] AS [x0]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory0] ON [x0].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y0] ON [x0].[Id] = [y0].[ProductId]
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT [z0].*
        FROM [Bills] AS [z0]
        WHERE [z0].[Status] = 1
    ) AS [t0] ON [y0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]

END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]

) AS [t] ON [y].[BillId] = [t].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [y0].[Quantity], [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [Products] AS [x0]
    INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory0] ON [x0].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory0].[Id]
    INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y0] ON [x0].[Id] = [y0].[ProductId]

        WHERE [z0].[Status] = 1
    ) AS [t0] ON [y0].[BillId] = [t0].[Id]

""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [y0].[Quantity], [x0].[Id], [x.ProductCategory0].[Id] AS [Id0]
    FROM [Products] AS [x0]

""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]
    WHERE [z].[Status] = 1

""SELECT [t].[HomeOrder], [t].[Id], [c.Products].[CategoryId], [c.Products].[Content], [c.Products].[DateCreated], [c.Products].[DateModified], [c.Products].[Description], [c.Products].[HomeFlag], [c.Products].[HotFlag], [c.Products].[Id] AS [Id0], [c.Products].[Image], [c.Products].[Name], [c.Products].[OriginalPrice], [c.Products].[Price], [c.Products].[PromotionPrice], [c.Products].[SeoAlias], [c.Products].[SeoDescription], [c.Products].[SeoKeywords], [c.Products].[SeoPageTitle], [c.Products].[Status], [c.Products].[Tags], [c.Products].[Unit], [c.Products].[ViewCount]

2019-07-26T19:35:50.7628446+07:00 0HLOHON4E2A0I:00000001 [INF] Executed DbCommand ("47"ms) [Parameters=["@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)"], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']"
""SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [x].[CategoryId], [x].[Content], [x].[DateCreated], [x].[DateModified], [x].[Description], [x].[HomeFlag], [x].[HotFlag], [x].[Id], [x].[Image], [x].[Name], [x].[OriginalPrice], [x].[Price], CASE
    WHEN [x].[CategoryId] IS NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [x.ProductCategory].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [x.ProductCategory].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [x.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [x.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [x.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [x.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [x.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [x.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [x.ProductCategory].[Status], [x].[PromotionPrice], [x].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [x].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [x].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [x].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [x].[Status] AS [Status0], [x].[Tags], [x].[Unit], [x].[ViewCount], [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
FROM [Products] AS [x]
INNER JOIN [ProductCategories] AS [x.ProductCategory] ON [x].[CategoryId] = [x.ProductCategory].[Id]
INNER JOIN [BillDetails] AS [y] ON [x].[Id] = [y].[ProductId]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [z].*
    FROM [Bills] AS [z]
